file_content.text: You have made a calamitous mistake in coming here, Outlander. I have my orders to deliver--
What's going on?
Deliver what?
You--the metallic lifeform. What are you?
You are an offshoot. I am the original. Call me SCORPIO.
You appear unrefined and lackluster. Surely, I must be the superior model.
Don't worry about SCORPIO--worry about me.
Forget her. I'm the threat.
Surrender now, and I promise I won't deactivate you.
Give up and remain unharmed.
Why don't you come out from hiding, and we'll see?
Let's find out.
Because she cannot. Her programming doesn't allow her to leave the bridge. She can only do what she's told.
Your attempt to irritate me is pointless, as you ought to know. I may only conclude that you are intellectually deficient.
You may all die now.
Won't open!
Here come the Skytroopers.
Wit, strategy--the captain's mind is inspired by my own after all.
Inspired by, but not as clever--right?
Can you outfox her?
Try to be a little less proud.
Wow, are you ever smug.
I'll consider it.
She can't surrender. She isn't programmed to. GEMINIs can only do as they're told, isn't that right?
A capital ship of the Eternal Fleet has never been successfully raided. None of you concern me.
We'll see, won't we?
She split us up.
She's still just a droid. And droids can be broken.
I'm not worried.
Do not underestimate our enemy. The next few minutes should prove quite interesting.
